    • add

      public void add​(TutorialToast toast, int ticks)
      Adds an active tutorial entry to this manager and the corresponding toast to the client's toast manager.
      Parameters:
      toast - the tutorial toast
      ticks - the time the toast will last, in client ticks
      Mappings:
      Namespace Name Mixin selector
      official a Lfbg;a(Ldxr;I)V
